title: Can't login, never changed regions
body:
I have played on NA since 2011. I have never transferred regions.

When I attempt to login to the client, it tells me "Your account has transferred to another region. Please try logging in to the appropriate region."

I have never, ever, changed regions.

Logged in to the league of legends website, if I try to go to my settings page or even to check my support ticket, it asks me to login again and claims "Sorry, we couldn't find that combination of username, password, and region" despite this account always existing in this region.

I have tried repairing the client and a complete fresh install. I get the same message. 

It lets me reset my password on the website but even after confirming I have a North American account, resetting my password, which it lets me do, I still cannot login.

I have a support ticket #23272066 but it won't even let me log back in to check it.

I have emails from as far back as 2011. I never transferred regions. I do not know how to get back into my account.

I have no idea how I am logged in now.

What can I do?

replies.body:
I confirmed your ticket was submitted successfully. We'll have an account specialist with you as soon as possible, since your ticket is already in the queue.

Let me know if you have any questions.
